entry.title: Example Post — Getting Started
entry.content:
Welcome to this example blog post. This demonstrates the post layout, metadata, and how content renders in your new Jekyll site.

What you can do next

  • Edit this file at _posts/2025-12-19-example-post.md and replace the content.
  • Add images by placing them in assets/images/ and linking them here.
  • Add more posts to see pagination in action on the Blog index.

  • Add more posts to see pagination in action on the Blog index.

Thanks for trying out the starter site — happy blogging!
